notes.title: Secret Shortcut Discovered
notes.content: On the Mountain Peak track, look for a hidden path behind the large pine tree near checkpoint 3. This shortcut can save you precious seconds!

notes.title: Holiday Event Schedule
notes.content: Join our special Christmas racing events every weekend! Special rewards and exclusive sleigh skins available for participants.

notes.title: Pro Tips: Ice Racing
notes.content: When racing on ice, use gentle steering inputs and avoid sudden movements. The key is to maintain momentum and plan your route ahead.

notes.title: Community Challenge
notes.content: This week's challenge: Complete the Forest Trail in under 2 minutes without collecting any gifts. Share your best times with the community!

notes.title: Weather Effects Guide
notes.content: Different weather conditions affect track grip. Snow reduces speed but increases control, while ice provides maximum speed but requires careful handling.

notes.title: Upcoming Features Teaser
notes.content: We're working on something special for New Year's! Stay tuned for announcements about new tracks, sleigh designs, and exciting gameplay features.
